data.title: Universidad Eugenio Maria de Hostos,Uniremhos
data.text:
Overview of Universidad Eugenio Maria de Hostos,Uniremhos

University Introduction:

The Universidad Eugenio Maria de Hostos, Uniremhos – Dominican Republic university is famous for its traditional framework. The university works on the main goal to satisfy the medical training need of the nation. The university is affiliated by the Ministry of Higher Education, Science and Technology of the Dominican Republic.

Faculty

The university has numerous academic and non-academic facilities such as the Faculty of Medicine, Faculty of Dentistry, Faculty of Nursing, Faculty of Social communication, and Faculty of Marketing and Administration. The university has more than 100 professional staff members to give world-class education to its students. The university also has a dedicated center of resources for learning and research. It is available to all the students and academic community members of the university.

Campus Life

The university provides innovative medical technologies to the students. The main focus area of the university is to provide round the clock comprehensive training to the students. The university has a research center. Other than this, the university has access to so many virtual libraries such as Eumednet Virtual Library, Digital Publication of the Royal Spanish, Mathematical Society, La Gaceta Digital, Network Doctoral Theses, Ebook Directory, Virtual Resources in Health Sciences, US National Library of Medicine, and National Science Foundation. The University Simulation and Robotics Hospital are well-known for its clinical simulation technology. Students can advance their skills using this health science center.

Accommodation

The university does not have its hostel, however, the sstudents can take a shared room or a bedroom apartment just outside the center. It is effortless to find affordable living space in Santo Domingo.
